channel.title: directory-traversing on Haruaki TAMADA

item.title: sibling
item.description: ğŸ—£ Overview When the directory has too may sub directories, we are tiresome to traverse whole of them. Because, we lose where we are. Ideally, we move directory by specifying the next, not directory name. The command like following makes us tired ğŸ‘ . cd ../next_directory_name We should type command like below ğŸ‘ . cdnext For this, I implemented sibling. ğŸº Install brew install tamada/brew/sibling ğŸŒ Web pages Project page on GitHub https://github.
